Input format:
============

The input format is line based. Lines are interpreted as commands. The last line of every page must be an p line.

If a line includes a # sign, it is interpreted as a page hash from the edit.tf or zxnet web editors. Simply pasting an URL from one of those editors should work.

A line with a > sign will be interpreted as a link. What is in front of the > is the short code, what is after the > is the relative or absolute page number. Absolute page numbers are prefixed with an asterisk *.

Example page set:

http://edit.tf/#1:QIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECAbJ3ZMvhBm--PR3w80CBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQBGbpBG38tuXYgYoECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIAWfl93IECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQIECBAgQAeW_

1>123
2>2
3>*30003
